EmailTemplate.name: Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation for attending The Ffreedom Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for confirming your attendance for The Ffreedom Day to be held on the 22nd of August 2010.
Below is the Program Schedule/ Itinerary for the Ffreedom:
10.30 am to 11.00 am – Registration (with Tea, Coffee & Refreshments) 11.00 am to 11.15 am – Opening Ceremony Chief Guest - TBA 11.30 am to 12.15 pm – Ffreedom Talks on Happiness 12.15 pm to 01.00 pm – Ffreedom Talks on Dreams 01.00 pm to 01.30 pm – Panel Discuss on Financial Freedom 01.30 pm to 01.45 pm – Closing Ceremony 01.45 pm onwards – Lunch & Cocktail
To read more about the about the speakers and event please visit us at www.ffreedomday.in
Event Venue: Hotel Novotel Mumbai - Juhu Beach Address:BalrajSahaniMarg, Juhu Beach, 400 049 Mumbai.
Map &Directions: From the airport, drive west towards the Western Express Highway. Cross over the Andheri Flyover before turning right at S.V. Road. Turn Left at V.L. Mehta Marg, and then right at Juhu Road where you will find the hotel. The journey is about 8 km. Nearest Railway Station: Andheri Station or Vile Parle Station
Help Desk: For any & all assistance you can email us at contact@ffreedom.in or call us at 022 4222 4333.
Looking forward to meeting you at the Ffreedom Day.
Thank you on behalf of the staff at Ffreedom Financial Planners.
Sincerely,
Team Ffreedom
Freedom Wealth Solutions Pvt. Ltd 506/507, Morya Landmark II, Near Infinity Mall, Link Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai - 400 053 Tel. 022 42224333 Email: contact@ffreedom.in Website - www.ffreedom.in
